title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-7.1 - Mercury emission limitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-7.1 - Mercury emission limitations

State Regulations

In addition to the mercury requirements contained in 40
CFR Part
60, Subpart Cb, incorporated by reference in Part 200 of this Title
(see Table 2, section
200.10
), the emission limitation
for mercury is 28 ug/dscm (corrected to seven percent oxygen) or 85 percent
removal, whichever is less stringent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
219-7.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
